channel.title: Riven the boy who lives
channel.description:
Hello everyone
i just started to model a sword . Its a special sword. Its the sword or Riven.+
im pritty new in modeling so please dont comment it in know it :D
here are the results of my work till now
if u got any ideas for me to make it better just pm me PLS
and i need a coder some1 who can add models ingame + i want to make a quest where u can collect each part of the sword and combine them and let the weapon grow and it gains str bonus each time
hope u like it :) [img]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/rivenop/Riven/sword1_zpsxcorovhn.png[/img]
[img]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/rivenop/Riven/sword3_zpsekcmdvqe.png[/img]
[img]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/rivenop/Riven/sword2_zpseupkexzg.png[/img]
still not done but its in progress (dont get confused about the red color)
comment your opinion please
Ps: sry for my bad English :/ ::Edit
ok now after a bit work i got the main sword fnished and the first part of it too
[img]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/rivenop/swordpart1_zpsnyzsjbgx.png[/img]
[img]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/rivenop/swordpart3_zpsrwhg3nib.png[/img]
[img]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/rivenop/swordpart2_zpsc8dumtjv.png[/img]

item.title: Riven the boy who lives
item.dc:creator: @soulduin soulduin
item.description:
@soulduin wrote:

I think its good to see new people trying new things I don’t see why you all have to hate on some one who just started some think they are just getting into but man keep up the good work in time you will be good at this

Read full topic

item.title: Riven the boy who lives
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

I don’t know much about modelling but I can tell you this, it is awful. I can’t see this in a game and, sorry dude it is just REALLY bad. It’s your first try though. Keep practicing

Read full topic
